body_html:
added checks that real-valued inputs must have real-valued backprops, allowing for quantized representation, same restriction for complex-valued.

while testing, found that some tensors (TopKV2, TensorArrayReadV3) produce integer valued gradients, so relaxed checks to allow for integer values, PTAL
body_text:
added checks that real-valued inputs must have real-valued backprops, allowing for quantized representation, same restriction for complex-valued.
while testing, found that some tensors (TopKV2, TensorArrayReadV3) produce integer valued gradients, so relaxed checks to allow for integer values, PTAL
body:
added checks that real-valued inputs must have real-valued backprops, allowing for quantized representation, same restriction for complex-valued.

while testing, found that some tensors (TopKV2, TensorArrayReadV3) produce integer valued gradients, so relaxed checks to allow for integer values, PTAL
